@CaissieLevy Stagedooring is not part of the job. Itâ€™s unfortunate so many expect it these days. Your theatre obligations are to give the best performance you can (you are amazing, btw!) and to take care of yourself. You have other obligations to your family; handle those w/o guilt. â¤ï¸

@ilanalevine In the south, summer hangs onto us.

@BroadwayGirlNYC Post surgery, retirement, & election, I was depressed, sedentary, gaining weight. Started my #WalkJogRun with showtunes playlist in mid-July, despite wonky knee. (Eating better too). 11 pounds dropped so far. Never thought Iâ€™d do it; seeing others doing the same inspires!
